scripts.build: octopus src/index.8o bin/chip8-test-suite.8o && cat bin/chip8-test-suite.8o | pbcopy
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-binary && npm run build-html
scripts.build-binary: npm run build && octo bin/chip8-test-suite.8o bin/chip8-test-suite.ch8
scripts.build-html: npm run build && octo --options octo-config.json bin/chip8-test-suite.8o docs/index.html
